languages.text: {n}Зауэрбэк хмурится и слегка наклоняет голову на бок — он впервые отводит взгляд в сторону, словно пытаясь припомнить или осознать что-то. За его спиной вы замечаете беспокойное движение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Толпа сохраняет молчание, лишь напряженные и испуганные взгляды мечутся между вами и Махарием. Зауэрбек хмурится и слегка наклоняет голову на бок — он впервые отводит взгляд в сторону, словно пытаясь вспомнить или понять что-то. За его спиной вы замечаете беспокойное движение.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sauerback furrows his brows and slightly cocks his head — he averts his gaze for the first time, as if trying to remember or make sense of something. You notice some restless movements behind him.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Зауэрбэк хмурится и слегка наклоняет голову на бок — он впервые отводит взгляд в сторону, словно пытаясь припомнить или осознать что-то. За его спиной вы замечаете беспокойное движение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback furrows his brows and tilts his head to the side slightly — it is the first time when he averts his gaze, as if trying to remember or realise something. You notice some restless movements behind his back.{/n}

{n}Sauerback furrows his brows and tilts his head to the side slightly — it is the first time when he averts his gaze, as if trying to remember or realise something. You notice some restless movements behind his back.{/n}

{n}Sauerback furrows his brows and slightly cocks his head—it is the first time he looks away, as if trying to remember or make sense of something. You notice some restless movements behind his back.{/n}

{n}Sauerback furrows his brows and slightly cocks his head—it is the first time he looks away, as if trying to remember or make sense of something. You notice some restless movements behind his back.{/n}

{n}Sauerback furrows his brows and slightly cocks his head — he averts his gaze for the first time, as if trying to remember or make sense of something. You notice some restless movements behind him.{/n}

{n}Sauerback furrows his brows and slightly cocks his head — he averts his gaze for the first time, as if trying to remember or make sense of something. You notice some restless movements behind him.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ザウアーバックは眉間にしわを寄せるとわずかに首を傾げる。何かを思い出そうとしているのか、意味を理解しようとしているのか、初めて視線をそらす。その背後でせわしなく動く存在にあなたは気づく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback furrows his brows and slightly cocks his head — he averts his gaze for the first time, as if trying to remember or make sense of something. You notice some restless movements behind him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ザウアーバックは眉間にしわを寄せるとわずかに首を傾げる。何かを思い出そうとしているのか、意味を理解しようとしているのか、初めて視線をそらす。その背後でせわしなく動く存在にあなたは気づく。{/n}

languages.text: {n}苏尔贝克皱起眉头，微微侧过脑袋。这还是他第一次转开目光，似乎在努力回忆或是弄懂什么事情。你注意到他的身后传来些许骚动。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback furrows his brows and slightly cocks his head — he averts his gaze for the first time, as if trying to remember or make sense of something. You notice some restless movements behind him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}苏尔贝克皱起眉头，微微侧过脑袋。这是他第一次转开目光，似乎在努力回忆或是弄懂什么事情。你注意到他的身后传来些许骚动。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sauerback fronce les sourcils et incline légèrement la tête sur le côté. Pour la première fois, il détourne le regard, comme s'il essayait de se rappeler ou de comprendre quelque chose. Derrière lui, son entourage semble soudain très agité.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback furrows his brows and slightly cocks his head — he averts his gaze for the first time, as if trying to remember or make sense of something. You notice some restless movements behind him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback fronce les sourcils et incline légèrement la tête sur le côté. Pour la première fois, il détourne le regard, comme s'il essayait de se rappeler ou de comprendre quelque chose. Derrière lui, son entourage semble soudain très agité.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sauerback frunce el ceño y ladea ligeramente la cabeza. Es la primera vez que aparta la mirada, como si intentara recordar algo o darle sentido. Notas movimientos inquietos a su espalda.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback furrows his brows and slightly cocks his head — he averts his gaze for the first time, as if trying to remember or make sense of something. You notice some restless movements behind him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback frunce el ceño y ladea ligeramente la cabeza. Es la primera vez que mira hacia otro lado, como si intentara recordar algo o darle sentido. Notas movimientos inquietantes detrás de él.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sauerback runzelt die Stirn und legt den Kopf leicht schief. Es ist das erste Mal, dass er wegblickt, wie um sich an etwas zu erinnern oder etwas zu verstehen. Du bemerkst unruhige Bewegungen hinter seinem Rücken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback furrows his brows and slightly cocks his head — he averts his gaze for the first time, as if trying to remember or make sense of something. You notice some restless movements behind him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback runzelt die Stirn und legt den Kopf leicht schief. Es ist das erste Mal, dass er wegblickt, wie um sich an etwas zu erinnern oder etwas zu verstehen. Du bemerkst unruhige Bewegungen hinter seinem Rücken.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sauerback, kaşlarını çatıp başını hafifçe kaldırıyor. Sanki bir şeyi hatırlamaya veya anlamaya çalışır gibi ilk defa bakışlarını kaçırıyor. Arkasındakilerden bazılarıysa huzursuzca kımıldanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback furrows his brows and slightly cocks his head — he averts his gaze for the first time, as if trying to remember or make sense of something. You notice some restless movements behind him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback kaşlarını çatıp başını hafifçe kaldırıyor. Sanki bir şeyler hatırlamaya veya bir şeyi anlamaya çalışır gibi ilk defa bakışlarını kaçırıyor. Arkasındakilerden bazılarıysa huzursuzca kımıldanıyor.{/n}
